name: Pad Thai
description: Pad Thai is a flavorful Thai stir-fried noodle dish made with rice noodles, tofu, shrimp or chicken, bean sprouts, peanuts, and eggs, seasoned with a blend of tamarind, fish sauce, and palm sugar.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: The Margherita pizza is a traditional Italian pizza topped with fresh, ripe tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaves, and a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil on a thin, crispy crust.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Chicken Tikka Masala is a popular Indian dish consisting of marinated and grilled chicken pieces, served in a rich, creamy, and spiced tomato sauce.

name: Caesar Salad
description: A classic Caesar Salad consists of crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, shaved parmesan cheese, and is dressed with a zesty Caesar dressing.

name: Beef Stir-Fry
description: The Beef Stir-Fry is a delectable Chinese dish featuring thinly sliced beef, stir-fried with a colorful array of fresh vegetables such as bell peppers, broccoli, and carrots.

name: Lasagna
description: A classic Italian dish, Lasagna features layers of wide pasta sheets, Bolognese sauce made with ground meat and tomatoes, creamy b√©chamel sauce, and a generous amount of melted cheese.
